description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Gratuitous ultraviolence, just the way you like it! Play solo or test your reflexes with up to three of your friends. Use your Drumkit or a standard controller, & show them moles who's boss!
